name: FriendFeed API Core
author: Sudar

sections.description:
Does little else but load the core FriendFeed API library for any Plugin that wants to utilize it.

It also helps minimize potential conflicts between Open Flash Chart powered plugins.

More details at http://sudarmuthu.com/wordpress/friendfeed-api-core

Readme Generator

This Readme file was generated using wp-readme, which generates readme files for WordPress Plugins.
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
